original: Araṇaṁ vipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam vipākam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na vipākaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Saraṇaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: saraṇam vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Araṇaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: araṇam vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na vipāka dhamma dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Araṇaṁ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
